text: Leeds City College is a college in the City of Leeds, West Yorkshire, England. It is for further education, that is, education after finishing the compulsory years of secondary school. It is the largest college for further education in Leeds. It has around 57,000 students, and 2,300 staff. It makes about Â£78 million each year.Ofsted report March 2010 Retrieved 29 June 2010 ==References== Category:2009 establishments in England Category:Colleges and universities in England Category:Organisations based in Leeds
title: Leeds City College
